issue.title: Val can't stand up after update

content.raw: As a note on this, I was having more 'fall at start' failures than I expected a while back, and I very deliberately added a user to my system and made that user the 'srcsim' user.  So that user is in the real time group.  I then removed the real time priority from my regular user which I use for web browsing and running our code.  It's a mild chore, as you've got to repeat the setup steps, chown and all, for the new user, but after doing that, I've seen far fewer 'fall down on start' issues.
